'''Gene Lester''' appeared in "[[The One Where The Stripper Cries]]". He was playing the game show Pyramid with [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]. He is a database specialist with a kid going into college and is getting surgery on his knee. Joey lost him 10 grand. He was played by Gregory Jbara.
